verses.text: O sing un - to the Lord a new song; sing un - to the Lord; Sing un - to the Lord, all ye lands, with joy, praise the Lord; Make a joy - ful noise un - to the Lord, all ye earth; and re - joice and sing ... praise.
With harp and with voice of mel - o - dy un - to our God, Sing un - to the Lord; and bless be our God, Let the sea roar, and the ful - ness there - of; the world, and they that dwell there - in.

Sing un - to the Lord, and bless be our God, with thank - ful - ness and joy; Let the floods clap their hands to - ge - ther, and let the hills be joy - ful; sing in the pres - ence of the Lord; our God shall make us free.
